ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Senior software engineer with 10 years of experience. With a high experience on startups and fast paced environments, I am equipped with the tools to deliver high quality products and accompany a client to all phases of their project.
ABOUT_ME.EXTRA: With experience in a multitude of sectors like medical (cardiologs sold to Philips in 2022), oil & gas and observability, I can adapt to any domain and deliver a great product.

GARMIN_SLEEP_DATA.TITLE: Garmin sleep data
GARMIN_SLEEP_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A graph that displays sleep data coming from a garmin smartwatch. It shows the sleep and wake up times along with the total hours slept.

SCALED_SCATTER_PLOT.TITLE: Scaled Scatter Plot
SCALED_SCATTER_PLOT.DESCRIPTION: A scatter plot that displays data points with scaled axes. The scaling helps to visualize the distribution and relationships between the data points more effectively.
